participant_1.background:
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
I have always been close to my parents.
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I've been working at my current job for a year.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

participant_2.background:
I like to take my time getting ready in the morning, then grab a quick coffee and head out on my daily drive.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
i am a nurse and work in an emergency room at a busy hospital.
i like going barefoot.
sometimes , people worry i am crazy.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! What do you do for a living?
I'm a nurse, and I love my job. I work in an emergency room at a busy hospital.
That sounds like a very important job! I'm sure you make a difference in people's lives.
Thanks! I like to think so. What do you do for fun?
I like to cook, listen to vinyl records, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great ways to relax and unwind. I'm not much of a cook myself, but I love listening to music and spending time with my loved ones.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! What are some of your favorite vinyl records?
I have a lot of favorite records, but I'd have to say The Beatles' "Abbey Road" is one of my all-time favorites.
That's a great album! I love the Beatles.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
What are some of your favorite things to do with your family and friends?
I love going on hikes, playing board games, and just hanging out.
Those all sound like great ways to spend time with loved ones.
They are! I'm glad we have so many things in common.
Me too! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
Me too! I think we're going to get along great
